item.title: Need a update command
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

i would like a to know whats then matter with this code

if (command.startsWith("update") && playerRights >= 3){ PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
I thought if i used this code it would create a system were it tells the player there is a update in what ever seconds then when it hits 0 the server resets it self, yet the code didn’t do that it lag and had a error in the server command prompt which was the OutOfBounds error does anyone have a update command?

Read full topic
